name: Kim
description: Kim er seniorkonsulent og har jobbet som Software Engineer i Snap Inc. I tillegg har han jobbet som fullstack-utvikler for appen Voisey, både med backend for selve appen og utvikling av interne verktøy på web.På fritiden spiller Kim spiller slagverk i Bergen Brass Band og Åsane Musikklag. Han bruker også mye tid sammen samboeren Guro og deres langhårede schäferhund Becca.
haiku:
Code by day, sound by night
Becca's wagging tail delight
Music soothes his soul
summary_en:
Here is a summary of the description of Kim in English:

Kim is an experienced consultant and has worked as a Software Engineer at Snap Inc. Additionally, he has developed full-stack applications for the Voisey app, handling both backend and developing internal tools on the web. In his free time, Kim enjoys playing drums with the Bergen Brass Band and Åsane Musikklag, while also spending quality time with his partner Guro and their long-haired dog Becca.
